name: df-in
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(cin(c0, c1), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
comment: Define the intersection of two classes. Definition 5.6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 16. For example, ` ( { 1 , 3 } i^i { 1 , 8 } ) = { 1 } ` ( ~ ex-in ). Contrast this operation with union ` ( A u. B ) ` ( ~ df-un ) and difference ` ( A \ B ) ` ( ~ df-dif ). For alternate definitions in terms of class difference, requiring no dummy variables, see ~ dfin2 and ~ dfin4 . For intersection defined in terms of union, see ~ dfin3 . (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-1994.)
